total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 5s on the top and bottom in the input grid.
Q2: For the cells identified in Q1, check if they are also surrounded by 5s on the left and right.
Q3: If a cell is surrounded by 5s on all four sides, change the value of the cell to 1.
Q4: Apply the rules from Q1 to Q3 to all cells in the input grid to generate the output grid.

Q1: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 5s on the top and bottom, and 0s on the left and right in the input grid.
Q2: Replace these identified cells with 1s to generate the output grid.
